remaining.description: Weve wanted to go for a while now, so why not? The ITO Experience is a 5-course meal with a wine pairing. The menu changes every month, so itll be a surprise!
A romantic evening with a home-cooked meal by me, food can be on request.  Set in a cozy ambiance with candlelight.
Order a high-class meal from a top restaurant on a lieferdienst (sarcasm), delivered to enjoy a virtual date at home.
A movie marathon night with themed snacks, movies/series can be anything you choose.
Spend the evening 'traveling' to a chosen country with its cuisine, movies, and music. Your pick! I or us both can cook together.
A date with food, who knows what it will be?
Sorry, luck of the draw. Relax with a frozen pizza or the like, while watching TV.
Enjoy a unique meal from Simon's exclusive KÃ¶lner delivery service.  The menu is a surprise, but it comes with a really hot date.
Hmm, breakfast for dinner?  Why not?  Crepes or french toast, you choose. Maple syrup is a must.
Ill make the napolean dough, you choose the toppings.  We can make it together or you can watch me make it.  Bella ciao, bella ciao, bella ciao ciao ciao.

remaining.option: DIY Wine, Cheese and Spa Night
remaining.description: We make your flat (its warmer and has a bathtub) into a spa-like environment with DIY heilerd face masks, relaxing music, and a bubble bath. Added bonus: wine and cheese.

removed.description: Another place weve never gotten around to trying.  Enjoy a romantic evening with some pricey italian food.
